pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Structural Equation Embedded Likelihood Framework for Causal Discovery // Provides the SELF criteria to learn causal structure. Please cite "Ruichu Cai, Jie Qiao, Zhenjie Zhang, Zhifeng Hao. SELF: Structural Equational Embedded Likelihood Framework for Causal Discovery. AAAI. 2018."
